images.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this image?
instructions: You can upload images from any hosting service, such as Google Drive, Google Docs, Dropbox, etc.
After uploading images from Google Drive or Google Docs, make sure the file sharing is enabled so we can display them.
Alternatively, you can use the form above to upload your images directly to our cloud service.
Paste the image link into the "Image URL" field.
(Optional) Add an image description in the "Description" field.
Click the "Add" button to save the image.
